TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IX509CertificateDatabase implements class Org.BouncyCastle.X509.Store.IX509Store, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: An interface for an X.509 Certificate database.
Docs.remarks: An X.509 certificate database is used for storing certificates, metdata related to the certificates (such as encryption algorithms supported by the associated client), certificate revocation lists (CRLs), and private keys.

Docs.remarks: Adds the specified certificate record to the database.

Docs.summary: Finds the CRL records for the specified issuer.
Docs.returns: The matching CRL records populated with the desired fields.
Docs.remarks: Searches the database for CRL records matching the specified issuer, returning all matching records populated with the desired fields.

Docs.param: The match selector or null to match all certificates.
true if only trusted certificates should be returned.
Docs.summary: Finds the certificate records matching the specified selector.
Docs.returns: The matching certificate records populated with the desired fields.
Docs.remarks: Searches the database for certificate records matching the selector, returning all of the matching records populated with the desired fields.

Docs.summary: Finds the certificate records for the specified mailbox.
Docs.returns: The matching certificate records populated with the desired fields.
Docs.remarks: Searches the database for certificates matching the specified mailbox that are valid for the date and time specified, returning all matching records populated with the desired fields.
